page.title: 20CONCERNS-PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: Many people in our area are concerned about the{destruction}of {trees}and{farming land}for building. {Unemployment}is very high,nearly {one}in{five}people are unemployed, especially among teenagers who have just left school. Adults think that young people are driven to{vandalism}having no job prospects.Vandals take their anger out on{objects,}& destroy phone boxes. { Penpol Creek}and many others where some people are no longer able to swim in the {polluted }waters.Houses and boats dump their{sewage}in the{Creek. { Bus Services}are being reduced, this causes the{elderly}to walk longer distances. A new roundabout was built which now causes traffic congestion. In Carnon Downs a new road will be built and eight foot of a garden will be demolished.
